timezoneParams.option: GMT(London, Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, Casablanca, Monrovia)
GMT+1:00 (Paris,Amsterdam, Berlin, Rome, Vienna, Madrid, Warsaw, Brussels)
GMT+2:00 (Israel, Cairo, Athens, Helsinki, Istanbul, Buchrest)
GMT+8:00 (Beijing, Singapore, Taipei, Kuala Lumpur, Irkutsk, Perth)
GMT+10:00 (Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Canberra, Guam, Hobart)

device.deviceconfig:
#Fimrware Version SIP for Cisco 7940 image_version: P0S3-8-12-00
#Vox Number messages_uri: "%%vm_number%%"
#DTMF Mode dtmf_inband: "1" dtmf_db_level: "3"
#Dialing dialedNumber: "true"
# Allow Transfer to be completed while target phone is still ringing (Options: 0-Disabled, 1-Enabled) semi_attended_transfer: "1"

#Setting for 3CX Phone System Server {IF network=LOCALLAN} proxy1_address: %%pbx_ip%% proxy_register: 1 proxy1_port: %%param::sipport%% timer_register_expires: "900"
# Outbound Proxy outbound_proxy: "" outbound_proxy_port: "" {ENDIF}
{IF network=SBC} proxy1_address: %%local_sbc_ip%% proxy_register: 1 proxy1_port: %%local_sbc_port%% timer_register_expires: "900"
# Outbound Proxy outbound_proxy: %%local_sbc_ip%% outbound_proxy_port: %%local_sbc_port%% {ENDIF}
#Setting for Timezone and DST, Option GMT,CET,EET,BT,IT,ZP4,AFG,ZP5,IST,ZP6,SUM,WAST,HST,JST,CAST,EAST,EADT,NZST,IDL,NT,AHST,IMT,YST,PST,MST,CST,EST,AST,NST,BST,AT,WAT sntp_server: "%%param::time_ntp_server%%" sntp_mode: unicast time_zone: "%%param::time_timezone_cisco79x0%%" dst_offset: 1 dst_start_month: March dst_start_day_of_week: Sun dst_start_week_of_month: 8 dst_start_time: 01 dst_stop_month: Oct dst_stop_day_of_week: Sun dst_stop_week_of_month: 8 dst_stop_time: 02 dst_auto_adjust: 1 time_format_24hr: 1 date_format : M/D/Y
#Line 1 Setting line1_name: "%%extension_number%%" line1_authname: "%%extension_auth_id%%" line1_displayname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%" line1_password: "%%extension_auth_pw%%" line1_shortname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%"
#Line 2 Setting line2_name: "%%extension_number%%" line2_authname: "%%extension_auth_id%%" line2_displayname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%" line2_password: "%%extension_auth_pw%%" line2_shortname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%"
{IF ua=Cisco-CP7960G} #Line 3 Setting line3_name: "%%extension_number%%" line3_authname: "%%extension_auth_id%%" line3_displayname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%" line3_password: "%%extension_auth_pw%%" line3_shortname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%"
#Line 4 Setting line4_name: "%%extension_number%%" line4_authname: "%%extension_auth_id%%" line4_displayname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%" line4_password: "%%extension_auth_pw%%" line4_shortname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%"
#Line 5 Setting line5_name: "%%extension_number%%" line5_authname: "%%extension_auth_id%%" line5_displayname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%" line5_password: "%%extension_auth_pw%%" line5_shortname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%"
#Line 6 Setting line6_name: "%%extension_number%%" line6_authname: "%%extension_auth_id%%" line6_displayname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%" line6_password: "%%extension_auth_pw%%" line6_shortname: "%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%" {ENDIF}
#Default Codec preferred_codec: %%codec1%% {IF network=LOCALLAN} #3CX Phone System Tbook max 32 entries directory_url: "%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/cisco_phonebook.xml"
#3CX Logo logo_url: "%%PROVLINKLOCAL%%/logo/cisco9740.bmp" {ENDIF}
{IF network=SBC} #3CX Phone System Tbook max 32 entries directory_url: "%%PROVLINKEXT%%/cisco_phonebook.xml"
#3CX Logo logo_url: "%%PROVLINKEXT%%/logo/cisco9740.bmp" {ENDIF}
# NAT/Firewall Traversal nat_enable: "1" nat_address: "" voip_control_port: "5060" start_media_port: "16384" end_media_port: "32766" nat_received_processing: "0"
# Display Name of Phone in right upper conrner phone_label: "3CX %%extension_number%%"
# Remote Debugging via Telnet (0-Disabled, 1-Enabled, 2-Privileged) telnet_level: "2" phone_prompt: "3CXPhoneSystem" phone_password: "cisco"
